item.title: Xiaomi's latest flagship smartphone is the MIX Fold 2
item.description:
Source: Xiaomi. The MIX Fold 2 is available in Black and Gold colourways. Xiaomi recently debuted its most advanced foldable phone, the Xiaomi MIX Fold 2, in Mainland China. The company also introduced the Xiaomi Pad 5 Pro, Redmi K50 Ultra, and a variety of other ecosystem devices. When unfolded, the Xiaomi MIX Fold 2 measures a mere 5.4mm1, providing a seamless viewing experience across its inner and outer screens...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/xiaomi-s-latest-flagship-smartphone-is-the-mix-fold-2/
